title: Cecile
body: Oh, it's just that she looks just like someone I used to know... #line:10000200
She's a bit too young to be her though. #line:10000300
Someday I'll work up the courage to ask her about it. #line:10000400

title: NoCecile
body: Even though she's not in the village. #line:10000500
I can't stop thinking about her. #line:10000600
There's just something I really want to ask her... #line:10000700

title: NotSpoken
body: Someday I'll work up the courage to talk to you... #line:10000900
It helps me keep my thoughts in order. #line:10001100

title: Rem
body: You want to know more about ^c:1486b0;Rem^c:pop;? #line:10001200
We grew up together - childhood friends if you would. #line:10001300

title: ComeForMe
body: Things must be pretty serious if ^c:1486b0;Rem^c:pop; came out here looking for me... #line:10001400
I feel bad for not being able to visit more often... #line:10001500
